comment: Wish he had more opportunities for grades. There were only a few assignments and due to missing one test from an injury to my finger (sliced on a wine glass) my grade plummeted. I could've done well but I wish had he been a bit more understanding. I passed My last semester with all As and a D in this class.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Randy is by far the best prof i've had at KSU. he's so fun/down to earth, even made me want to go to class even tho attendance isn't mandatory. he even made me interested in the stock market from his life story's and success. just show up, take notes and you'll be fine! he only grades hw and tests but if you put in a little effort you'll get an A!

Professor Randy is an awesome teacher, He is a little old-fashioned and doesn't use any power points. Everything he teaches is on the whiteboard, he teaches mostly through funny storytelling and real-life application. 2 in person tests that are tricky if you didn't go to lectures and a few online quizzes he encourages you to "use your resources" on
For contemporary economics there is no one else I would recommend, best econ lectures at this level. (I sit through econ lectures for fun, so I think I know what I'm talking about)
He doesnt use PowerPoint but instead teaches with his prior knowledge and experiences.

His tests are from the lectures. Only has 2 tests (micro then macro) and 7 HW assignments. Get 100 on the hw b/c the tests will be difficult if you don't come to class or get notes. If in class record his lectures because he does not do presentations. He writes on a whiteboard. Make sure to submit the homework and not let it submit for you.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Randy was an amazing teacher. While attendance wasn't mandatory, I would highly suggest going because he teaches trough his life stories to help you understand how Econ relates to the world. There was very few HW assignments, but he allows you collaborate with other students on them. Overall, Randy was a great teacher, highly recommend.

Randy isn't your standard teacher. He teaches his class through life stories rather than textbook examples.  All of his homework assignments are based off his lectures, so attendance is highly suggested but not required. Show up, do well on your homework and you are going to get an A for sure.

 Randy is the GOAT 10/10 would recommended!

Randy is one of the most chill professors i've ever had. He uses "bad words" daily and makes this class entertaining. Only 2 tests the whole class. Everything you need is in his lectures. He does not post anything on D2L so I suggest going to class unless you have people in the class to send you notes.

Professor Goodwin's class is an entertaining ride - his lectures keep you engaged with real-world examples. Though tests can be tricky, using unstuckstudy AI alongside the textbook helps prep. Overall, a solid class if you stay on top of it.

This class was my favorite taken so far! He is an amazing professor who has a great sense of humor and uses his own life experiences to help explain economics which helps a lot to understand concepts. i would love to take his class again and highly recommend randy, it's always a fun time in class!
really fun teacher just wish he had more assignments so you have more opportunity to get a better grade
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: He could be a better teacher if you need to know the content. Very few things grade you because he has four assignments and two tests. He does not even explain what is on the test. He gives scenarios about his life that are sometimes unrelated to the topic.
Show up and you will get an A. Very Easy!

If you need a professor that uses power points,resources through D2L,or provides help outside of class then I would NOT taken him. He teaches through like life stories and it was extremely confusing to me and made it hard to take notes. There are 5 homework assignments and 2 tests but I was learning nothing so I had to drop this class mid semester.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: He was great. We only took 2 tests and like 5 homework assignments and that was our entire grade. He only lectures
He is a good professor. Just be prepared to learn in a different way. By that i mean through his life stories. Wording can be a little odd on test but really easy for the most part

Professor Goodwin is a very creative professor. He is very entertaining during his lectures and mostly keeps it on point. He doesn't go off PowerPoints, so if you miss class, you have to look at the book or ask for people's notes. Very easy class if you show up and pay attention since he created the tests. Would highly suggest taking his class.

He is a really great professor. Each lecture is really informative and he is just a funny guy. Good at giving examples and walking you through each topic. If you don't go to class YOU WILL NOT PASS. The downside about this class is that he doesn't post anything on D2L. But 100% take him if you are willing to go to class, you wont regret.

This professor was an exhilarating lecturer that was almost always speaking with an outside voice/yelling loudly. Lectured from a podium and occasionally used his computer when he needed to look up something. I sat at the back of the class and I got an A. No funny business. Just a guy yelling at you and you getting the graphs down until you know it
rating_tags: Test heavy--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: Funniest professor I've ever had. You MUST watch his lectures, or you cannot take the exams. 8 tests no lockdown and one exam (optional). Tests are tricky but every single question can be found in his lectures. Lectures take up about an hour a week with no additional homework/studying. Any question you have receive a reply back within hours.
Class was set up awfully 8 test were the only grades and the weekly videos/lectures had nothing to do with the test questions.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: There are only 5 tests that are graded but he drops the lowest and the final is not required if you're content with your grade before it. The tests were online and very difficult but open everything. Honestly if this class isn't a big focus to your major and you don't mind likely getting a B then take him. I didn't attend at all and got a B

Class was comprised of 5 tests and a final with the lowest grade dropped at the end of the semester. Randy's lectures were entertaining enough to listen to, however, there was a disconnect between the material covered vs. what was on the test. Lots of the questions felt like trick questions. Even after studying tests were still difficult.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy

comment: DO NOT TAKE HIM!!!!! Only has 5 test grades and the final, might I add his tests are nothing like what he discusses. He says to not get the textbook, you might want to. He does not care about you as a student. If you take him, bless your heart and good luck.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy

comment: Take at your own risk. Majority of the class struggled.

Only uses online lectures, writes tests in a complicated format, does not curve grade or have extra credit, only grades are 5 tests and a final, lectures do not match textbook readings and neither textbook or lectures match the tests. He seems funny and says it is an easy class but no one recieved an A on 3/5 tests. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Do not take. His tests are very hard and do not relate to his study guides. Also, gives no extra credit and your only grades are tests.

Horrible professor. Only 5 tests and a final. His lecture videos are boring and he sits in a dark room in his house. No attendance and absolutely zero room for error. A classmate had a baby born a few hours before the final test and Randy denied an extension for the student. Awful right? Don't waste your time with him.
His test are really hard and his study guides barely help you with tests.

Dont take him! The only way he teaches is prerecorded lectures, where he sits in-front of a camera and speaks. He doesnt use PowerPoints, says to go by his word and not the book. In class he says same thing as recorded lectures. Only grades are tests and THEY ARE SOO HARD!! Zero extension, you have 5 minutes to get on the test or you get a zero.

This class was all pre recorded lectures. He never contacted students, you have to contact him. He responds in a timely manner. As far as the materials, I would get confused because the book said one thing and he said another. The tests were some of the hardest I've ever taken in my life. I wouldn't recommend this professor.
He's simply the GOAT. Best teacher/professor I've ever had.

I took this class online and it wasnt really stressful. Make sure you read the chapters he assigns. He didnt offer extra credit for my class, so YOU make or break your own grade. We had five test and one final. No homework. He posted lectures online.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: His class is easy and straightforward. you are only graded on tests based off the textbook and he gives a review test before so as long as you attend lectures and do the review you should be good
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: He is clearly passionate about the subject matter and is very good at illustrating difficult concepts. If you just show up to class, listen, and do the practice exams then you'll never have to study for this class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy--Amazing lectures

comment: Randy is my favorite teacher ever. You have to go to the lectures because that is where all the material for tests are, but it was my favorite part of my week half the time. I never left that class without a laugh. No need to get the textbook, he does not even use it. Randy is hilarious and even though my class was at 6:30 pm, I loved it! TAKE HIM!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Amazing lectures

comment: Goodwin is a great professor. Loves his job and is hilarious! Made me consider majoring in econ. Only material on tests is his lectures but his lectures are great so dont let that scare you and go to class you'll get an A!!!!

Randy is legit the GOAT of all professors at KSU. He is an amazing lecturer, and one heck of a storyteller! I had his class from 8-9:15 PM and I found myself wanting to go each and every time. He is an amazing guy who really cares about the stuff he teaches and his students. I am definitely taking him again down the line. Graded on 3/4 Exams only.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Amazing lectures

comment: Amazing!! He is hilarious. Make sure you go to class because he is not tech savy at all. All the information is in person, no hw assignments. Only 3 tests and an optional final!

THE BEST PROFESSOR I HAVE EVER HAD! He breaks down the material in a simplistic, story telling way. I really enjoy coming to his class. As long as you come to class and listen/ take notes - Then you can easily make an A!

Probably the best professor I have EVER had. He doesn't post anything on D2L so you have to go to class to take notes but he makes the lectures super entertaining and makes everything easy to understand. He is also available during office hours and really cares about his students. TAKE HIS CLASS!!!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Goodwin is one of the best at ksu. This was my second time taking econ 2200. First time was with Kirby,horrible. Goodwin made the class enjoyable and wanted to make sure the students understood. 4 tests, last one is optional. Had a study guide for each one. It was thorough and he also went over it. I hate econ and got a B. TAKE HIM. HE'S AMAZING!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy--Amazing lectures

comment: No book required. He goes over EVERYTHING on the tests. If you take notes on what he says or record lectures you will get an A. Attendance is not required but go the man is hilarious! Need to make a class called Story time with Randy... his stories are great! Super approachable, if you don't understand just speak up he wants you to learn. Love him!
Breaks the material down into parts, tells stories and uses the material in real world application. Very funny and kind man. Show up to class, take notes and you will do just fine.

If you attend class and take notes, it's an easy class. Tests are lecture based (although attendance is not required) He makes his lectures fun as he usually tells a story describing the concept. He gives out study guides to prepare for the tests and is available to review them with you during office hours
He is an amazing Professor. The only reason why I didn't get a B or higher is because I missed a test and could not make it up.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Amazing lectures

comment: 3 tests and a final (he takes highest 3). His lectures are good, but you can get the textbook and teach yourself. If you remember high school econ stuff you'll do good.

There are three tests and a final. The lowest score is dropped. He gave extra credit on the final exam day in the form of a smaller quiz. You do not have to go to class ever, except for exams if you do not want to. I did not buy the book. The tests were pretty straightforward. They are pretty similar to the reviews he gives you. GREAT PROFESSOR!!!
rating_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Amazing lectures--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Love Randy!! He is easily one of the best professors I have ever had. His lectures are so entertaining and applicable to daily life. However, he does not use D2L at all so make sure you take good notes in class! There were only 3 tests and a final. Lowest test score dropped.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Goodwin is an incredible professor, and I love attending his classes. I was terrified of taking Economics, and he has made a difficult subject fun.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Amazing lectures

comment: "Randy is just talking" - Randy Goodwin, Circa every class. Randy is hilarious and uses real life experiences to explain economic concepts and, trust me, this man has lived a life. His stories are captivating, hilarious and actually really good at getting his points across. He's an insanely cool guy, recommend 100%.

This is one of the few classes that I truly enjoyed going to. I feel like I actually learned valuable information. Also, he's a wonderful and very caring professor. Just go to class and take good notes
Literally the best, a real gem of a professor who really cared. Taught on life experiences. He's retired but just had to mention how awesome he was.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Best professor in Econ, explains things extremely well, just show up and you'll make an A
Amazing, I don't know why I'm writing this though because he's retiring this year.
This guy is good at giving lectures and is always there to help you. Drops the lowest of the 4 test. Take him!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--Would take again

comment: Randy is a wonderful professor. I'm so sad it's his last semester before retirement. His lectures and stories were so inspiring, and his personality is one in a million. Only 3 exams, final is optional depending on your grade comfortability. Gives study guides for each exam. So kind and flexible with students. A must take! He's a KSU staple!
Dr. Goodwin is the best professor to take economics with! I had him for both ECON 2100 and 2200, and I never regretted it. As long as you take good notes and review them, you'll do well!

Take Randy!! My favorite professor thus far. Three tests with an optional final. He is hilarious and keeps the class engaged. He recommends not getting the textbook because he will tell you everything you need to know so go to class and take good notes. One of the best!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Would take again

comment: Best teacher I've ever had. Really loves to teach and cares about you learning it. 3 tests and an "optional" final if you do well on the first three. Would definitely take again.
rating_tags: Respected--Tests? Not many--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Randy cares about his students and is actually passionate about teaching unlike a lot of other professors. He gives great lectures and uses his humor to keep the class engaged. No homework, no quizzes, just 3 tests with an optional final. The lowest grade gets dropped. The best professor I've had thus far. Would most definitely take again

Randy is very straightforward on how to do well in his class. You come to class listen to his lectures (which are actually very interesting) and take notes. Then for the test you study your notes and a set of practice problems he gives you. He does three tests and an optional final. He knows what he's talking about and makes it pretty entertaining.

By far one of the best professors I have ever had. Not only does he teach really well, but he is really funny so he can keep you interested. Only graded on three tests and an optional final, but the tests are really easy if you go to class and take notes. The study guide also really helps on the test. Overall show up and TAKE GOOD NOTES.

I really liked this class. Dr. Goodwin is hilarious and his lectures make you actually want to come to class. There is no homework or quizzes, just 3 tests and the final was optional. The tests weren't that difficult, mainly based on the study guides and the lectures. Overall a great class and would recommend.

Best professor at KSU. Teaches you everything you need for the tests and gives a study guide that covers it all. 3 tests, if you have an A after the 3rd you're done. He offers a cumulative final for those who want to raise their grade after the 3 tests. Hilarious dude who knows everything - ask him a question and he will make sure you understand.

Randy is the best, if you ever get the chance TAKE HIM. He's hilarious, I never wanted to miss a lecture, and he explains things really well. 3 exams and the final if you're happy with your average you don't have to take the final. Made learning about macro economics super fun and interesting. Amazing, top 5 favorite teachers of all time!!!

Amazing professor, took him twice! Made economics my favorite subject. I enjoyed showing up to class because his lectures made the subject easy to understand. Take him if you can, you won't regret it. 4 EXAMS and one is exempted. Do well on the first three and you can skip final.

Randy is a passionate teacher and really knows how to explain Economics to his students. I wish all teachers were able to teach a subject they love so clearly. His tests are multiple choice, he gives a study guide which helps you prepare for the 40-50 MC questions. I would definitely recommend taking his class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Goodwin is an amazing professor! I've had other economics professors in the past, but he is the best by far. His lectures are informative and easy to understand, and his tests come directly from the lectures.
Professor Goodwin is really funny and interesting to listen to however he doesn't use D2L so you have to go to class in order to take notes based on the lecture.

Randy is a great teacher. He makes sure that anyone can understand econ. His test is based on his lectures so if you miss his lectures you will not do well on the test. Your grade is determined by 4 test scores. Show up to class and you will do great!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Randy is the absolute best. He makes class enjoyable to attend and relates the material to real world experiences, which makes the content much easier to grasp. I would recommend 10/10. One of the best professors I've ever had!

Super laid back and is big on you keeping yourself accountable. He lectures and that's it. No quizzes, no homework, only tests. He offers 4 tests but takes the best 3. Everything is from his lecture so you have to listen and take good notes. Some topics are hard but you either get it or you dont. Easy A/B

The funniest professor i've ever had. Teaches the class through humor and funny stories. DAMNIT. Class is only graded on 3 tests, all of which were pretty hard. if you go and listen and study for the tests though you should be able to get a B or an A. Even if you don't its worth taking his class just to listen to the man lmao.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Randy is an absolutely amazing professor and he's always willing to explain things. He can be a little difficult to contact outside of class, though I did wait to do so until the end of the semester. He only gives a few tests for this course and those are the only grades you get, but they weren't absurd; they were all multiple choice tests.

One of the best proffesors I have ever had! His lectures are story based so it's very interesting and he doesn't use the book at all. If you show up to class and follow his stories you will pass. Your grade is based on 4 test ( including final)  which he gives you practice tests for and drops lowest grade!

One of the best lecturers I've had. He doesn't assign pointless assignments. The only grades are tests and there's enough of them to keep a single test from ruining your grade. His lectures are definitely worth your time as he's good at making ideas concrete through examples and stories.

Randy Goodwin is an absolute godsend. In my opinion econ is god awfully boring but somehow he made it into my favorite class. His lectures are super fun and engaging filled with hilarious stories to boot- no busy work, 4 tests,(including the final) lowest dropped, idk what else to say other than I straight up love this man.

My favorite professor I've ever had. I do not like econ, but I loved going to his class to hear his lectures and even did well in the class. Go to class and pay close attention. Record his lectures and listen to them again before the tests - helped me a ton. You will never be bored in his class and will learn to love econ!

THE best professor I have ever had. Taught material in an easy to learn way and through story telling. Highly qualified and very helpful. I highly recommend him. He does not teach by the textbook so GO TO CLASS. If you go to class you will pass.
One of the best teachers I ever had. Made Econ fun and easy to understand. Taught through telling stories.

DEFINITELY need to come to class to pass. Lectures are very informative and all test questions will come from them - no book work. (so no homework! yay!) That said, tests are a lot tougher than it would seem if you just study your notes. He gives a practice test though that's almost exactly like the real one. Study that and you're golden.

Professor Goodwin is the best professor ever at Kennesaw State University. If you need to take ECON at any level I would recommend him. He just tells you story's that relates to ECON and then shows you.

If your like me and is the type that has to study extra hard to understand the material, dont take his class!I would go to class take notes come home to review and go on youtube!The tests are really tricky and difficult!He is funny and uses alot of real life examples.I regret taking his class:(
He was a good professor.  Knows the material.  Great lecturer- keeps the class engaged.  I would take him again.

Good Ole Randy! I LOVE the way he taught. He truly made economics extremely interesting! He provided hilarious real-life examples and there was never a dull moment in class. He has 3 tests and optional final. I would not say the tests are easy, they can be tricky. The review packets aren't similar to the tests.

I wish the course included a discussion on the ethics of economics, since economic decisions are primarily ethical ones. The professor acknowledges this weakness, and I wish he would try to circumvent it, but alas, no such luck. He is otherwise an excellent professor who presents tangible lectures suited to his tests.

Easily one of the best professors I have ever had. He is easy to relate to, clear, and doesn't bog down your schedule with tons of homework. I highly recommend taking him. He is planning to retire next year though, so take him now!!

Easily the best teacher I have ever had. Gives interesting, entertaining and funny lectures. For ECON 2100 only 3 tests and final, one of which can be dropped. Tells a multitude of interesting real-world stories to ensure understanding of topic. Doesn't require book, everything he puts on test he has gone over in previous lectures. Would take again

This is by far my favorite professor! He is so clear. He only teaches what you need to know for the tests. go to every class because he will tell you test questions and specific things you need to know. The study guide only has the math portion of the test covered but that is why you need to go to class. He is so funny and has great stories.

Easily the funniest professor I've had. Plus he explained economics in a way that made me actually understand it. I took the class a while back and to this day I still use his stories to understand Econ. He doesn't make you buy the book or assign a bunch of homework. It's one of the few classes where the lectures actually prepare you for the tests.

one of the best, this was my second time taking econ 2100 i took it before and studied hard yet i failed. with Randy all i had to do was going to class and listen. didnt have to buy the book nor push my self hard. i understood everything i needed in class and i am an international student. Randy , you are the man,.

Dr. Goodwin is a funny man who has tons of interesting stories to help us understand the material he is teaching. The book was not necessary, but I used it to for clarification on some things I didn't quite understand. His lectures consist of mostly talking and writing a few things on the white board. The tests were very tricky. Knowing is the key.

This is the BEST class I have ever taken. Goodwin is funny, entertaining, and makes the material super clear. No need for the book, but it's essential to go to every lecture. All the material is extremely relevant. Gives study guides for math problems. Took this class in the 8-week summer session and wish it was longer because I enjoyed it so much.

Extremely intelligent man. He knows how to engage students, and very obviously loves his job. He loves to talk as much as possible and honestly this is the only professor I've had in three years that I cling to every word. I'm always interested in what he says next. I have a terrible econ professor next semester, I wish it was Randy. TAKE HIS CLASS

Great class. He is very funny and gives great lectures. No textbook required, just make sure you go to class and listen to his lectures and you will be fine. Gives good practice exams to help you prepare for his test.

He is quite simply the best teacher in the U.S. He displays the material of each lecture masterfully, he wants you to succeed, he enjoys talking with his students after class, he is funny, and you wish that you could have him for all of your future business classes.  If every professor were like Randy the world would be a better place.

Took him for micro and macro. Definitely take him if he's available. As a senior and can look back and saw he was my favorite professor. No book, just straight stories and you'll definitely laugh every class.
the best professor at KSU, simply that.

I took Randy for Macro and Micro. Great professor. If you want to love a class he is the person to take. I did't put too much outside effort in the class- maybe a few hours before the test- got As. NO BOOK NEEDED.

Goodwin is probably my favorite professor so far. Just actually go to class his lectures are entertaining and helped more than anything else for the test. Also he gives an amazing study. Pay attention in class and actually study the study guide and you will get an A.
Probably one of the best professors I've ever had! If you skip class, don't expect to do well on tests. I barely got a B in this class because i skipped class so much. I would take him all over!

Professor Goodwin is a funny guy, it makes class interesting.  Definitely an odd-ball, but in a good way.  Attendance is not mandatory and he told the class specifically there was no need to buy the book, but if you want to pass, show up and take good notes.  Exams are not the easiest, but if you pay attention and do some studying, you'll make an A

By far the greatest professor I've ever taken, If you pay attention and take decent notes and study you should be good on his tests. His lectures are very entertaining so its not a burden to ever be in his class. No homework or any other assignments, just show up to class and listen and you will be fine.
He's just a great teacher, really good at explaining boring things in a much more interesting way.

Wonderful professor, incredibly knowledgeable and he WANTS each of you to succeed! Go to class, follow along, do the review packets before the test, and you'll do great! I will be taking him again for my other Econ courses!!

I have thoroughly enjoyed taking his class. If you show up and stay engaged it is an easy A. Teaches his class through stories which I find funny and helpful. He goes over stuff multiple times to make sure everyone understands it. He gives study guides out before each test, and then goes over them in detail the next class.  Take his class!

He's an okay teacher, funny sometimes. He is nice when he wants to be, but can be rude. He likes himself alot, and mainly lectures on the things he owns and tries to relate them to economics. He doesnt like to answer questions bc he feels he already taught it.

Ok, Professor Randy is an amazing teacher! I'm sure the people saying his tests are too hard either didn't pay attention in class, or didn't go to class at all. Randy teaches by telling (hilarious) stories, and then relates them to Economics in a way you can actually understand. Minimal note-taking and studying required. Made like a 98...

So funny! explains econ in a variety of stories that are easy to understand. no assignments, only quizzes and tests. very smart, very good at his job, love having him. gives clear study guides and reviews them in class. dedicated to making sure every question asked is answered thoroughly and so the student completely undestands. AWESOME

Randy Goodwin is one of the best professors Kennesaw has to offer. Attendance is not required but highly recommended. He will tell you on the first day that he will teach you everything you need to know in class, so a text book is not mandatory. He teaches through story telling and keeps the class engaged. His tests are just like the study guides.
This class is extremely complex.  Buy the book, even if professor says not to.  The final is cumulatative, but you will need it to pull up your grade.
Professor Goodwin is funny, but his tests are hard as crap.  No curve so you better study.
Yikes!  You must buy the book if you want to understand economics.  Dull, boring material that is super difficult to comprehend.
He's a nice guy, but his tests are so hard.  Dry material with lots of memorization required.
Very hard class.  His lectures have nothing to do with the tests.  Take another professor.
Hard class, if you don't love economics, run fast.  Tests are impossible.
Hard class...hard material.  Professor tells funny stories and the class seems easy, but the test ARE hard.  You have to study quite a bit to understand the concepts.

Very intuitive style of teaching. Uses stories and personal experience rather than dry textbook lingo. If you don't laugh at least once, you have no sense of humor. Tests aren't too bad, and you only have to take 3; the fourth is just in case you don't like your grade. Econ major approved.
One of my favorite teachers. The class is easy if you take good notes and go over the book some. 4 tests, only have to take 3. Final is cumulative.

BUY THE BOOK if you're a visual learner. He gives textbook exams. I didn't understand his chicken-scratch on the board, and his notes were unorganized. If I would have bought the book, I would have gotten a way better grade. He is funny, and is a good guy - just wish I knew to buy the book (He tells you not to)
This professor introduced me to a love for economics. I still use some of his stories and explanations now that I teach AP Microeconomics at a local high school. Highly recommend.

Love this professor, He teaches the material by telling stories with different scenario's so you can understand the material.  He is very helpful. Class is not mandatory, but recommended. Grade is based upon 3 test.

Funny guy. My only issue is that he tells stories, but gives textbook exams. Attendance is not mandatory, but you should go to take good notes and get the study guides. He does not give them out if you missed class. Do well on the first 3 test and you don't have to take the final. Overall I enjoyed his class. Do NOT buy the book.

Awesome guy! Very entertaining! 4 test. He only takes the 3 highest grades. If you are happy with the first 3 test grades then you are exempt from the final. Attend the first day for the 2 point quiz. No homework. No book needed. Attend class he gives study guides, also buy/rent the study guide for the book from Chegg.com. Study & you will do well!
One of the best professors at KSU. I wish I was a business major so I could take more classes with him. Randy knows his stuff, and you would be a fool not to take his class. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

By far the BEST PROFESSOR I ever had in my entire life! He is so smart and his classes are so interesting and funny, I enjoyed every single one. His class made me think about majoring in Econ. Very straight forward, four tests and thats it. No need to buy the book or attend class, however you must go in order to get a good grade.
Professor Goodwin is by far the best educator I have ever had. There are no assignments just three tests and a final.The tests aren't hard if you come to class and take notes.  Take him!

Great professor, one of the best I've taken in any course. You must go to class, but there is no need to buy a textbook. Pay attention to his stories! Although he's funny, he's not auditioning to be a comedian; There is a specific purpose to every story. He makes class fun and he's very specific about what he wants you to know. I highly recommend.

Randy is absolutely hilarious. If you don't like ECON you will love it by the end. He is a phenomenal professor.  The exams are extremely hard, but take this class if you want to learn a ton. I don't think any professor could ever top Randy. He has a great southern accent, it always made my day to hear him talk. He is from the Savannah coast!

Great teacher but no heart whatsoever. DON'T have any kind of emergency he will not let you make up any exam regardless of how in advance you notify him.I missed 2 due to my wedding and my husband being hospitalized. He did not care; I had to receive WF which I am now appealing. He noted on the appeal that he was NOT in support of it.
Easy if you take it over the summer. Super nice and really funny

THis prof is the BEST at ksu, class is not boring at all and interesting 24/7, uses lots of funny stories to help students understand the ideas better. Book is not needed at all, but class attendance is neccesary, if you need help he will stay after class until you get it. He tells you everything on the test, so come to class and this is a easy A

His stories are interesting, but he does not reply to emails. The professor makes up his own questions and the answers are similar to each other. He will say, "this will be on the test" but not nearly enough times (note, there are 50 questions). Entertaining? Yes. Helpful? Maybe. Hard? Yes, and confusing. I would recommend a different professor.
Content and style of teaching is of the highest quality. He strings together the material into a large narrative using relevant examples and perfect clarity. I highly recommend taking his class.
Do not take this class.. He is very funny and nice but he is never available. His test are very hard multiple choice 50 questions. He never use the book. I don't recomend him.

Fun! He teaches using stories that make concepts easier to grasp. He tells you "THIS IS A TEST QUESTION" during his lectures, so show up, take notes, get A. Its easy and he is great for a laugh with the stories of his money making schemes.

GREAT PROF! Go 2 class, pay attention, take notes, review, get an A, EASY. If you have a question come to class & ask it. He gives a study guide but many ?s still come from lectures but he makes it easy by saying, "this is a test question....". When he says that, write it down, underline it, then review it. EASY! Be attentive, get an A. +no book!!!

By far the worst professor at KSU. Do not listen to the reviews on here about him being a great professor. He is nice and funny, but a horrible professor and it is impossible to talk to him. He doesn't answer questions. Tests are extremely hard and multiple choice with reworded answers that all seem the same. Do not take this class!

Very humorous professor. Teaches through stories which makes info easier to understand and retain. No homework, just class lectures and 4 tests. If you are good with first 3, you can exempt final. No busy work and no BS. Loved his class! (Note: Take good notes. Test is all on your notes. Review helps, but notes are the key.)
I would recomend taking someone else.

This professor is, in all honesty, the only professor i actually thought was worth giving a compliment, i enjoyed his class so much i have directed my major towards econ. He builds and motivates you each day. He is not hard as long as you dont fail to keep focused. tests are straight forward no h/w no need to buy text book

Randy is a hoot! For a class that isn't the easiest to understand, he makes it fun by teaching through his life stories. You don't need the book. Attendance isn't mandatory but if you miss a lecture, it'll be difficult to recover. One of the best professors I've ever taken. Great guy! I made a B. I'd take him again if I could.

If you don't take Randy then you aren't experiencing Econ the right way. BOOK AND ATTENDANCE NOT REQUIRED. FUNNY. I actually loved going to class. Make time to talk to him after class or he will not know you exist. He is a smart and cool guy. TAKE HIM!! I'm taking him for 2200 over summer.. at 8pm. That's how good he is.
Dr. Goodwin is hands down the best college professor I have ever had.  He keeps your attention from day one and makes you want to learn about Economics.

Had Randy for Econ 2100 and now for 2200.  Amazing professor.  He brilliantly aligns his teaching objective with life stories and you hardly realize you are learning; but you are!  Tests are hard and you MUST learn the material. He clearly states "here's a test question" for key points . You will know what's on the test; be sure to KNOW it.

Appreciated Professor Goodwin so much in 2200 I turned right back around and took his 2300 class the following semester. He is fair, straightforward, provides examples to which everyone can relate, knows his material thoroughly, is organized, and delivers grades promptly! If only they made more like him!
Quite possibly the best professor i've ever had. Uses real life examples to actually TEACH you the material. Really funny and nice guy easy to talk to.

By far one of the best professors @ KSU. I absolutely despised economics before taking his class. Down to earth and very funny. Gives only 4 exams and drops the lowest so you could potentially not have to take the final. Just go to class and take notes. Book is not needed. Easy "A" and you actually learn something useful!

No text book required, he doesn't want students wasting money. If you really want one buy ANY cheap Econ textbook, it will work. Four test lowest score dropped. Has quizzes prior to the first three test to help you understand the material. If you attend class, pay attention, and put in a little effort you can make an A without taking the final.

Goodwin is an excellent teacher.  He does a great job of telling "stories" that correlate with real world events. I didn't have to open the textbook because his lectures were so good. He drops the lowest test grade and doesn't require you take the final if you are happy with your grade. I highly recommend him!

Four tests, drops the lowest grade. Tests are pretty comprehensive.  He is extremely entertaining and interesting. Has tons of stories that relate back to the material and keeps you engaged in what would otherwise be dry material.  Really enjoyed the class overall.
Dr. Goodwin is an extremely intelligent economist. He made the class funny and easy and he used real life examples. If you come to class and study the review; the tests are easy.

I took him because of his ratings & I heard a lot about him. I made my first C in my entire life in this class. He's a funny guy and makes class fun, but don't think the class is easy because of that. It was the hardest class I have ever taken and I studied my butt off. He does not register the class on vista; you cannot contact him or email him!

Hands down, the BEST professor I've ever taken!! Randy is HILARIOUS! He does an amazing job of relating the material to real life scenarios that he's experienced. I didn't buy the book, as all the material is based on lectures. He adds 5 points to every test; 3 tests & a final. He drops the lowest test grade. You must study material! FUN PROFESSOR!

AMAZING PROFESSOR!! I LOVED him! He made Econ interesting and easy to understand complicated concepts. He is HILARIOUS and adds 5 points to every test. You'll definitely have to study for his test and take good notes, but he gives you copies of old tests to study by. I would take him again if I could! 3 tests and an optional final thats cumulative.
Loved him! His stories are entertaining and illustrative. He makes economics interesting and relevant to real life. Tests are difficult but the study guides are the same format as the test questions.

Took him for 2100 and 2200 and wish he taught the upper level econ courses, since I changed my major to that after this class. He is probably the most valuable prof. KSU has. If I had a chance to take him or some top prof. from harvard id take him any day. Learned so much in his class, which was challenging in a good way though. TAKE HIM!!!

Randy is amazing. He is one of the most intelligent professors I have ever met in my life. Besides being absolutely hilarious, he is a fantastic teacher. Tests are hard, but if you take notes and study hard, you'll do fine. total of 4 tests but only takes the 3 best grades. He is fantastic. TAKE HIM! He makes econ so interesting!!!

Truly amazing teacher. Makes difficult concepts crystal clear and gives great examples. Keeps class interesting with great stories that help you understand the material. There are only three grades, and they are your best three test scores. Also, he randomly gives an attendance quiz that can give you 3 points to your final grade.

BEST TEACHER I'VE EVER HAD!!! he makes econ SO interesting! His tests are STRAIGHT from his lectures but he's SO FUNNY and entertaining! Time flies by in his class!! he'll tell you questions on the test but they usually come with a curve. So watch out!No attendance and no book. GO TO CLASS! I would take any class her ever taught! A+++++++++++++

GREAT PROFESSOR!!I would wait to take him!He is hilarious & very personable.I have NO interest in ECON.he made it very fun & entertaining.work is 3 tests & final. drops lowest grade. take/study notes!No Attendance but go! no book. Talks with the class & not at it.Waits after class to help anyone.GREAT stories/application! you'll learn about shrimp.

Challenging tests! You'll be able to pass the tests as long as you take amazing notes. Attendance isn't mandatory, but I recommend it. Though the stories he tells are not on the test, the concepts behind them are. Hilarious professor! Miss his stories.
good professor! very interesting, uses a lot of examples! no book!!! 4 exams, but your best 3 are counted. exams were difficult to me because of the wordings, overall easy class.

Goodwin is the best teacher I have ever had in my life. His tests are tricky, but COMPLETELY from his lectures He always adds 5pts He is so funny and he makes everything so interesting. You will  learn about real life and the world from someone with experience. Extra credit for just showing up to class at random! A must take teacher the best ever

took him for microeconomics and his class was way laid back and fun actually. quite entertaining too. but his exams are very difficult jsut because of the wordings. basically you need to come to class otherwise you won't do well on the exams, which there are only 3, but the final can replace your lowest grade.

Wow! What a teacher! To those who complain about his talking about his family, YOU DON"T GET IT!! All his stories are 100% applicable and relevant to the material. EASILY the best professor at KSU. I only wish he taught more classes. If you have trouble on his tests, it's because you didn't listen and take notes. PERIOD!

Randy is the MAN! Seriously like sitting through a stand up comedy class. Very down to earth and uses real world stories related to sports, the economy, and businesses to explain how different aspects of econ work. Very easy to understand and very engaging. Keeps your attention. If you go to class and take notes you will do well. No text book used

Took this class over the summer and loved it. Don't buy the textbook unless you want to read it for fun. No hw, attendance quizzes that only help your grade, not hurt it. You do have to study for tests though. He is such a great guy, I would definitely take him again.
Awesome Professor!! Take him if you get the chance! Class was easy, no textbook needed, and the final is optional! And he tells lots of funny stories!

By far one of the best professors I have had! He teaches very clearly and its pretty easy to understand. He also tells a lot of stories! His test can be tough, you have to study for them. Still I would take him again if I could! Take him if you get a chance!

Most definitely the most interesting professor I've ever taken. His lectures are informative and hilarious. The tests are not easy however, make sure you take good notes and study thoroughly because exams can be difficult. Overall I would take him again though
Randy is wonderful. Don't buy the book beforehand he doesn't use it at all. Tests come from his lectures alone. He brings Econ. alive. Everyone should take this class.

The best college professor I've ever had. He breaks down the material into simple concepts and funny stories. Thanks to one of his classes, I'm going to GT next year. But honestly - it's so easy to retain information in his class, even if you only attend every other class. Take him if you get the opportunity!
If you are not a Business Major, then you may have a hard time. Buy the study guide!

If something is important, he will beat it to death. You will learn from this class as long as you have a set of ears. If you don't like  frantically scribbling notes and prefer storytime laced with mild curse words, then this is your paradise. He somehow makes everything - EVERYTHING - relevant to whatever he is teaching. It's kind of freaky.

This is my second class with Dr. Goodwin.  He's a great professor!  Uses real life scenerios to help get the point across and if you still don't get it, he's eager to help you understand the material.  He doesn't require you to be in class however, he doesn't use a text book, everything is on lecture.  Highly recommend taking his classes.

The most interesting teacher I have ever had. Lectures the entire time on real life situations that are easy to understand. I wish he was still teaching upper level courses, because I would take him every chance I could. Also, if you dont like the phrase 'Damn it' then dont take him.

This guy is great. He's taught for a long time & is very helpful. There are 4 tests, but the lowest grade is dropped. The class is easy even though I hate Econ!! Definitely recommend him (especially for non-business majors who just want to get the class over with)

This prof was so interesting that this non mandatory class was the one I attended most frequently! Test are difficult but drops lowest! No textbook, just some humorous lectures and an awesome class! Highly recommend!!!
he is one of the best teacher ever. Take him. the class was easy. 4 test and he drops the lowest one.

Randy is one of the BEST professors I have had at KSU. I thought Macro Econ was really dry and expected to dislike the topic. However, Randy made things very interesting. He is truly a gifted teacher and has a way of presenting material that captures your attention. Tests are not easy, but if you attend class and take notes, you should do well.

Nice guy and does make class interesting but the test are HARD! I studied and took lots of notes and did bad in the class. I would not take him again. He does nothing but lecture. Oh he also says to study the study guide for the test DONT! It DOES NOT HELP!!

I loved this professor. He made macro so interesting and humorous at times, who knew! I enjoyed his peppering of expletives during lectures because he was such a nice guy. Tests are not easy though, don't get too complacent during lectures!

Professor Goodwin is fair and makes every effort to help you do well in this class.  He does not take attendance.  He does not use a text book.  Attend his classes.  It is the only way you will do well.
Dr. Goodwin is an excellent professor.  Attend class and ask for help if you don't understand something.  He wants you to do well in his class. He makes a not so interesting subject interesting

Not sure why im writng given his other comments already posted. They are spot on. Randy is one of the best teachers this school has to offer. Dont understand how he explained something? Dont worry...Randy has a miilion other analogies to get his point across. You'll learn if you want to learn. Take his class!!
Best teacher I've had at KSU, I wish I could take him for every single one of my classes. It is hard to NOT pass this class.

GREAT PROF! Attendance is not mandatory, but recommended! No need to buy book.  Lectures are interesting! Take notes.  He makes the material EASY to understand, but you do have to THINK and apply the concepts on the tests.  I only attended class and took notes and made a 100 in the course.  Three tests and optional final.

I had Dr. Goodwin at Georgia Gwinnett College this past semester, and he was awesome. I'm a psychology major, so I was taking the class to satisfy a degree requirement, but I left with so much knowledge. Dr. Goodwin is entertaining and hilarious. You'll love his class. I never dreaded going once. I learned so much through his stories. Take him!

Excellent teacher!  Take really good notes and use the study guide.  I received an A in both Econ 2100 and 2200 taught by Dr. Goodwin.  Although the book is not used in class I suggest you read it and answer all of the questions for the chapter in the study guide.  This will help prepare you for the test.  His tests are very hard.

Best teacher I have ever had. I wish he taught every single one of my classes! He is hilarious but still makes sure his students understand everything. His class is the only one I have ever looked forward to going to.

AWESOME PROFESSOR! He is funny and laid back. Attendance is not required but it's best to come because everything you need to know for his tests are in his lectures. Class is very entertaining and I've learned so many useful things from him. He's always in a good moor and loves the subject he teaches. I highly recommend taking his class.

To be honest, one of the best teachers I had last semester.  He doesn't care about attendance but if you want to do well in his class you need to go to class cuase most of the stuff on the test he tell you in class.  No need for a book.  He gives 4 test and counts 3 so you got a goo shot at an A!

I am asking you to take this teacher. He is so baller and fun. I never get bored, I have learned so much from this guy. I hated Economy before his class, and now it is my favorite class this year. TAKE HIM!!!
Great professor!No need to buy a book. He will tell you exactly what he wants you to know. I did zero studying for his exams and got a good grade just by going to class.

Randy is CRAZY and keeps class super light and fun. You have 3 tests and an optional final. Pretty straight forward. The only thing to watch out for are how he words questions on his tests. They are sometimes tricky and really make you think. Over all LOVED him and kept me awake during class.

Excellent teacher but it was not as easy as I thought it would be as per the description in previous comments.  He does make everything clear but his questions on the tests are a bit more difficult than the examples he uses in class.

He is a very entertaining guy, but that's not to say that you won't actually learn anything. He's been teaching ECON for over 30 years, and his knowledge of the subject really shows. He ties lectures into current events often, and explains things in a way that you can actually listen to the news and understand how it works. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
Outstanding professor! Really teaches you how to see through political rhetoric in discussions on economics. 3 tests and an optional final. Easy and fascinating.
LOVE HIM, LOVE HIM, LOVE HIM!!!! HE IS A GREAT TEACHER!

Goodwin is a FANTASTIC professor. Went into the class thinking ECON to be BORING. Goodwin shows how interesting it actually is. AMAZING teacher. Really. Yeah, 3 tests, but they are NOT hard if you come to class and listen (and laugh). I still took the final for fun even though I was exempt. Best professor at KSU. I highly recommend him :)

Easily one of the top professors at Kennesaw. 3 exams and an optional final.  Take detailed notes, study them thoroughly, ask about things you don't understand, and there's your test answers.  I did not buy the book, only came to class.  The material seems like it would have been hard with anyone else, but he made everything crystal clear,  Easy A!

The attendance is not mandatory but you have to go to class. Everything is from lectures.  He is the BEST PROFESSOR I have ever had! Very smart and funny man and he knows how to teach! I would recomend him to anyone and everyone. I loved his class because of him.

Professor Goodwin seems like a really cool person and talks a lot about his family but that doesn't help you on his tests! His tests are nothing like his class discussions. I attended every class however when it came to taking the tests it WAS NOT LIKE THE DISCUSSIONS! Again he is a really nice guy but that won't help you pass the class.

Listening to prior students is helpful to being successful in this class. He is nice, really tries for you to understand the material and relates the topic to everyday life. Even if he says don't need the book, GET IT. Listen to the lecture, take notes then read. That'll make you do well and understand. Good teacher

Randy Goodwin is a teacher who has great lectures but his tests are tricky and makes it difficult to apply what he's taught you to the questions. Don't let his nice guy appearance fool you, Goodwin makes it difficult to make a decent grade in his class.

Dr. Goodwin has an amazing teching ability. The problem is that he does not teach in the manner that the tests are written and therefore when you see it you have no idea what it is saying. Great teacher but not an easy passing grade. I took him twice thinking it was me and still didn't pass. Took it later with someone else andd did great.
This guy's teaching ability is uncanny.  I would suggest taking him.

Randy is by far the best professor I have ever had.  I will take every class he teaches at this school even if it's not needed for me to graduate.  Makes the material easy to understand and works in personal stories and keeps it hilarious throughout the whole semester.  Easy to learn and make a great grade.

TAKE THIS TEACHER!!!! YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!!! NOT ONLY IS HE AN AMAZING TEACHER, GOING TO HIS CLASS IS LIKE GOING TO AN ENTERTAINING SHOW!!!  HE HAS A STORY TO TIE INTO EACH AND EVERY SUBJECT MAKING THE MATERIAL EASY TO RELATE TO AND EASY TO UNDERSTAND!!!  A BETTER TEACHER, THERE IS NOT!!!

BEST PROFESSOR AT KENNESAW! This guy is entertaining and really helps you understand the material. Just show up and listen and you will comprehend everything about Economics. He teaches what you need and lets you go early. Excellent job. Best class you'll take at this school.

LOVE HIM!!!!!!!! He is awesome. I swear he is the best teacher here. He made the material extremely interesting. I actually learned A LOT, yet the class was so easy. All you have to do is show up and take notes. He is hilarious. I almost considered changing my major to economics after him! IT IS A MISTAKE TO NOT TAKE HIM!
By far one of the best professors at KSU.  Very interesting on how he talked about econ and relates it to stories about his life.  Just listening to him is worth attending class.

I loved his class. He did cover everything that was on the tests. Strict memorization will not get u an A in the class but rather an understanding of the concepts. Missing class sets you back a lot, however, class is always fun. He is very entertaining and I looked forward to going to his classes. It is very possible to make 100s on tests.
Best teacher ever!

He is a very good teacher when your learning in class but when it comes to his tests they are extremely hard. he will not answer ANY questions during the test. I dont understand how a professor who wants their students to do well but will not help them at all with simple questions. do not take him.

he sounds good in begaing but his test are hard...so stuy the notes the proble with his class is that he teaches as you are in 1st grad. so you understand everything but the tests are word in college level...so u will be fine if you really study.

tests are hard and very unclear! never goes over the tests. he says book is not required but i suggest buying the book! and he does not teach everything! he pick and choose so you can not ever follow the book or study guide!!!!!!!!!!

I took Mr. Goodwin's class over a summer semester, and thoroughly enjoyed it. He is definitely the most likable of the professors I have encountered here at Kennesaw. You can't go wrong taking him for anything. One of the few lecture professors that still manage to make econ interesting. Test questions straight from book/ppt, counts 3/4 testgrades.

do not take him...he just talks about his borthers and family.  he does not review for any test.  he sounds really nice and caring but when it comes to helping you he do not help with anyting.  one girl form my class got D with 69...belive me take someone else
Did not recommend getting the book/stated he would teach everything we needed to know/final was cummulative/could not review test/no study guide..you will learn more about his family than anything.
Macro during the summer has been one of my best classes at KSU. It was a privilege  to take this class and learn how the USA works economically. I strongly recommend Dr. Goodwin.

Goodwin is a wonderful professor! If you are having a bad day, going into his class is uplifting...he will make you smile. I have learned a lot about econ and life from him and can't say enough nice things to describe him!!

He almost made me want to change my major to econ. He makes economics VERY interesting, and you walk out of class feeling like you've really gained valuable knowledge. The key to getting an A is just showing up for class and taking notes, which was not hard to do in my opinion. He doesn't use the book. Tests/quizzes aren't bad at all.
Absolutely the best professor I have ever had! Makes every class a pleasure. I walked out at the end of the semester feeling that I know everything!

Best teacher at KSU without a doubt.. the world would be a better place with more people like Goodwin.. connects with students, enjoys what he does, and def has a future in being a comedian.  I would highly recommend him to anyone!

Great Prof. One of the best at KSU! Class so fun I actually wanted to go! But, beware the test are not easy at all. You think they will be but they are very wordy. STUDY STUDY STUDY! And he does not take attendance, but if you miss one class and you dont take good notes you will not do well, becasue he does not use the BOOK AT ALL

Great teacher! Does not make you use the boock. Explaines everything in fun very easy to understand manor. You should not miss clases because it will be hard to catch up afterwords. I got A using only my notes from class and my understanding from class discutions. loved attending classes.

For people who hate econ and only take it because you have to, take Professor Goodwin. Econ sucks and Professor Goodwin adds a little humor to the class and uses real life examples to help explain the material. He's very nice and easy to approach.

GREAT GREAT GREAT!!! That is pretty much all i can say. Do NOT buy the book...just take his notes and study straight from them and you will make an A...it is not as easy as it looks so STUDY the notes. NO Homework just three exams and an optional final. Take him now cuz he is retiring after spring 08.
Didn't even buy the book! He tests exactly fromt he notes. Super nice guy, estremely laid back. Tough material, he makes it as easy as it can be.
Words can not explain - he's simply the best!

I hate econ and was dreading this class.  It doesn't make any sense at all to me.  Randy, as he prefers to be called, makes class understandable.  He reviews until everyone gets it.  Encourages questions.  Purely lecture.  Zero book reading.  I made a B with 30 minutes of studying before each test.  Highly recommend for the non-Econ major.
Makes class fun. Don't need the book if you listen and pay attention.

Dr. Goodwin is a pretty good teacher.  Tests are hard but he takes your top 3 grades out of 4 tests and if you already have the grade you want before the final you don't have to take the final.  I felt like he didn't want any class participation or us thinking on our own and he seemed sometimes annoyed by questions but he is still a good teacher.

Used interesting/funny life stories to explain points.  Very laid back, no attendance taken. Clear in getting points across. No text use hardly at all, purely lectures with illustrations.  If you can take good notes your good to go.  If you need to used a text then might require additional study time.  Tests are hard.
Very fun to go to class. Uses real life example stories to teach.

He has very interesting stories that relates to what he teaches. Even though he is fun you have to think like an economist to past his test. You need full understanding in any lecture. He is not involved in WebCT. No extra credit. Take good notes and study and you will do well.

Doesn't have an attendance policy, but no notes on WebCT. He doesn't use WebCT or text or anything. I sometimes felt that if I didn't understand something, I was stupid because he said it was all so easy that anyone could understand it.  Also, he does curse in class if you don't care. He is comical though.
He is indeed a great prof.  His teaching is great, but test are very difficult. i did not do well in class because of test but he gives you an awsome learning experience

Amazing Teacher. if you are taking econ take him now! he is retiring soon so hurry! relates everything to real world stuff. only need the text unless u need it no use in class. 4 tests (including final) lowest dropped. (so if u are happy with ure grade no final :) entertaining class to due to some of his stories.

he is a greta professor but the tests are so tough. u feel like u know everything because of the way he explains things u get the test and u have no idea what the questions are about. i guess he'd the best professor for econ anyways. no homework no extra work just go to class. attendance not mandetory

Great Teacher. Very helpful, relates the topic to real life so they are easier to remember. Tests are hard but fair and progressivly get harder each time. Optional final that replaces your lowest test grade, review sessions and test reviews

Prof. Goodwin tells great stories that allow you to understand the concepts that he is teaching.  He goes over the material to be sure that you get it before moving on.  3 tests and a final; drops lowest grade.  No homework, no extra credit opportunities.  Tests wicked hard b/c of Econ. wording.  Worked my but off for a C.  Recommend reading text!
Very good professor. Only issue with teaching style is the points are made but not for the test. You have a good understanding of real world econ, but not the logic to think trough a test.
Good ol' boy that doesn't require a textbook.  Tests are sneaky thought, but he drops the lowest one...

Prof Goodwin is a GREAT professor. His classes are fun and easy, there's no homework, you don't need the book AT ALL. Attendance is not mandatory, but you want to go to his class because he makes it fun and interesting. There are 3 tests + the final, all multiple choice, he drops your lowest test grade. I got A's on 1st 3 tests so I skipped final.

laid back class. funny teacher, makes lectures interesting and makes sure you understand them. there are no homework assignments and you don't need the book AT ALL. drops the lowest test grade outta 4 so you might not have to take the final!

AMAZING PROFESSOR!!!! His lectures are all a lot of fun, you'll probably actually feel bad if you ever miss a class. Great  guy, great sense of humor, you always laugh in that class. And he breaks down the material and tells great stories in between. You are seriously a dumbass if you are reading this and you dont take his class.

He is hilarious!!! He loves to tell stories but they actually help you to understand what he's trying to teach you. He tells you what to expect on the test and he weeds out all the info from the book that doesn't mean anything. Bought the book, never had to use it. His tests aren't easy but if you take good notes you should be ok.

Great teacher; very clear; No homework, no papers to write, and no other assignments other than tests.  He takes the 3 highest grades of your 4 tests.  Tests are tricky, but if you go to class you won't have too much of a problem getting a "B"  If you don't go to class, good luck,don't plan on getting an "A" unless you do a lot of independent study

Very interesting prof. Prob the best econ prof. Makes class interesting by all the many stories he has from Savannah about his brothers. Tests are sorta hard. Not really if you can understand the language on his tests. It is complicated. 3 tests. if you do bad on one you have a 4th one (final) which replaces the lowest test.

BEST TEACHER EVER!!!  I took him for both econ classes b/c I couldn't get enough.  Tests are kind of tricky b/c he doesn't write them and finds question from a "bank." If you don't take this professor, you're missing out.  He's retiring after spring '07 so hurry up

I know it has been said many times already but this guy is really the best teacher I have had at KSU.  I was NOT looking forward to this econ, especially after baring making a C in 2100.  I ended up making an A in his class.  I actually enjoyed class due to the way he lectures.  I only wished he taught more classes so I could take him again.
He's a good professor that makes the class understandable and easy.  You learn and don't have to stress yourself out.  He keeps the class lively.  I would totally recommend him.
BEST TEACHER I'VE EVER HAD!! HALARIOUS GUY THAT TELLS GREAT STORIES.  HE MAKES ECON UNDERSTANDABLE AND FUN.  I LEARNED A LOT OF INTERESTING THINGS IN HIS CLASS.  I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND HIM!!!
AWESOME PROFESSOR!  FUNNIEST AND MOST INTELLIGENT CLASS YOU MIGHT EVER TAKE.
The Man!  I was not looking forward to Econ, but with Dr. Goodwin I wanted to go to class.

He has got to be one of the best teachers at Kennesaw.  I refuse to take any other econ teacher.  The guy is hilarious and his stories will help you understand the material.  I did not buy the book and still got an A in both classes.  He does not have an attendence policy but you would be crazy to miss the class.  He is a hoot
Really made the class enjoyable, and the fact he didn't use the economics book made it that much better.
I HATE economics, but LOVED this class.  Goodwin is an awesome econ teacher. I refuse to take 2200 with anyone else! HIGHLY recommended!!!
Great professor, funny, and interesting.

Excellent teach!  His stories are always relevant. Most people complain about him because they wern't willing to do the work. Take notes and read the text lightly and you'll get an A. This guy is the reason I switch majors to business!

I wish I could take him again! No attendence policy, but I came anyway! Tests are easy to study for if you take basic notes and do the reviews. I think I walked out of both of his classes with a near perfect score!
This is the guy that got me interested in economics.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
No Comments

Prof Goodwin makes Econ interesting. Tests are multiple choice but I thought they were tricky. You have to read the question carefully and there are only about 35 questions so you can't miss that many. He is available to answer questions. The book helped me because sometimes the wording is different int he books and int he stories he tells.
Easy class and makes learning econ fun.  Tests are a fairly easy and his classes are short.

I was worried about econ, but I took the 2200 class after I learned so much in 2100. Prof is great; I would take his class over. He is hard, but prepares you for the tests very well. Go to class and take notes, then study hard, you can do well and learn a lot. He knows his stuff and is interesting!

Classes are fun! He's a great teacher and explains things in such a way that it clicks. Don't buy the book but do come to class every single day and take excellent notes! You will have to study hard for the test. Although he appears super easy from lectures, his tests are harder! EXCELLENT TEACHER!

Uses stories to illustrate econ principles. The hard part is you have to remember which story goes with the question on the test. The stories make class interesting but it is a little hard to relate to when it comes to the test. You have to study but don't buy the book, come to class
I am an international student and I would say that he is the best teacher I ever had in KSU.

Wonderful teacher who cuts through the confusion to help you understand economics. Tests come from a test bank, so they don't match lecture exactly. But if you put in nominal effort to understand the concepts he is teaching, it's a piece of cake.
I had this prof. for macro and micro. He is one of the best professors I've ever had! You don't need a book, just go to class and take good notes. He explains the material very clearly.

I agree with the person that said that he tells stories all day and the tests are awful.  I also witnessed him snap at several girls at different times and he seemed very rude.  Overall he is an OKAY teacher not the best but not the worst either.
This teacher tells stories all day and then he blasts you with a test that's out of this world.

This is the best Professor I've ever had.  He makes the class interesting and my girlfriend thinks he has a cute smile...  I can't wait to take the second class.  I would recommend him to any student that needs a great Professor on a difficult subject...
Just go to class and take notes. Don't need to buy a textbook. Lecture is too much clearity. He used to explain one simple thing over 3 times.

Great teacher, just be sure to show up and take notes! We took 3 tests and the "final" was an optional re-take of any of the 3 tests we wanted. Light work load, explains himself very well. Not as funny as he thinks he is, but bearable corny humo
Excellent, excellent teacher.  The best!  Funny.  Explains econ in real terms (beer, pizza and shrimp)and makes it so easy to understand.  Probably one of the best two professors I've ever had.

BEST TEACHER AT KSU!!! He explains econ in a way that's easy to understand.  Tests may be hard, but you'll learn so much.  Let him lead you - He's been doing it for almost 20 yrs and has his system down pat.  No Book needed, notes only, Easy A or B.
Goodwin does an outstanding job of explaining each new topic with an entertaining story. You need to go to every class and especially study the practice tests.
Was a good teacher very entertaining, tests were multiple choice and hard if you weren't into studing a lot, but ok with bell curve.
Teaches one thing, but tests on the other....keeps class fun and interesting!
I had Goodwin for three different Econ courses and thought he was great. Yes, the class was a challenge, but I learned a lot and enjoyed it!
Very entertaining stories, keeps class fun. He really knows his stuff. Very fair when it comes to grading.
he makes it fun and interesting but you do have to study and read to pass tests
Teaches one thing and tests on another.  Expect a C at best
No Comments
